about_the_game:
Dive into the enchanting world of Elysium, where ancient mechanisms coexist with serene skies and breathtaking landscapes. From towering clockwork structures to forgotten ruins, every corner of Elysium holds secrets waiting to be unearthed.



Uncover the mysteries of a forgotten paradise where danger lurks in the form of soul-powered clockwork beasts. Gather, craft, survive, and grow in power as you fight for survival and across a fractured landscape of diverse environments. Harvest unique resources to craft vital tools, contraptions, and airships, all aiding in your defense and exploration.



Work alone or with friends to build your fleet of airships. Airships are more than just transportation, they are an integral part of the core survival experience, serving as your main base of operations and fulfilling roles that aid in gathering and transporting raw materials, exploring new regions, and elevating play to new heights. Customize your airships, forge your destiny, and unravel the mysteries of Elysium in this unforgettable open-world RPG crafting game.



Fight to survive against a myriad of airborne enemies! Echoes of Elysium offers a unique blend of RPG, exploration, and creation in a beautifully crafted clockwork world. Level up, gain new abilities, and craft new gear to grow even more powerful. Guided by the Goddess Lethe, can you save Elysium from its doom?



At Loric Games, we're passionate about creating immersive co-op RPG experiences that captivate audiences worldwide. Headquartered in Arlington, Virginia, we're committed to pushing the boundaries of innovation and storytelling in the gaming industry.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An airship RPG set in the procedural world of Elysium. Gather resources to design, build, and live on your customized airships. Alone or with friends, take to the skies and discover clockwork wonders that clash with ancient mysteries in an untamed paradise.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
